description:
Anastasia is a sophomore at Saint Liliana Academy and Student Council Vice President. She`s a cool beauty with blonde hair, blue eyes, and she rarely shows her emotions. For some reason she has a prickly attitude towards http://anidb.net/ch45096 [Akito]. She doesn`t get along with http://anidb.net/ch45097 [Akiko] at all.
Source: ANN
name: Nasuhara Anastasia
